meanings.definition: The quality of being useful or capable of serving a purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her serviceablenesses in the kitchen made her a valuable member of the family.
meanings.sent2: The serviceablenesses of the new tool impressed the workers.
meanings.sent3: The robot's serviceablenesses in cooking led to some interesting dinner experiments.
meanings.sent4: His serviceablenesses as a problem solver were like a shining beacon in the office.
meanings.sent5: The serviceablenesses of the map made it easy to navigate the forest.

meanings.definition: The state of being in good working order or condition.
meanings.sent1: The serviceablenesses of the old car surprised everyone with its reliability.
meanings.sent2: Regular maintenance ensures the serviceablenesses of the machinery.
meanings.sent3: The serviceablenesses of the computer was so perfect that it never crashed.
meanings.sent4: The serviceablenesses of the clock was like a symphony of precision.
meanings.sent5: The serviceablenesses of the flashlight saved them during the power outage.
